name: Dragoon's Circle
text: This card is always treated as an "Omni" Spell. When this card is activated, you can send up to 3 "Dragoon" monsters with different names from your Extra Deck to the GY. When an Omni monster is Summoned: Target 1 card the opponent controls; destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Dragoon's Circle" once per turn.
